name: BF maze
description:
The pain. Hard test for your nervous system.

If you think that you have a good patience - this thing can change your opinion.

Some pressure for brain and spinal cord aaaaand... FRUSTRATION! A lot of frustration! You just can't think about something else.

Only a few people are able to beat this game

v1.03beta

Easy mode added
